name: Method of Loci (Soredbrain)
description:
Method of Loci is a narrative-driven 3rd-person platformer where you play as a child conquering your fears by traversing through challenges with puzzle elements and slowly revealing the story behind your surroundings.

Imagine Limbo meets Psychonauts 2.

Playing inside of the child's mind let’s you slowly dive into these different realms each one crazier than the last. From recognizable libraries to waters full of memories.
